skills.name: Love's Blessing - Affection
skills.description: For every 5% Dodge Rate a Doll has, they gain 1% Attack and Hashrate, max 10%.

skills.name: Love's Blessing - Benison
skills.description: Dodging 5 cumulative times deals 1 instance of Physical and Operand Damage equal to 150% to the enemy with the current lowest HP.

skills.name: Love's Blessing - Avoidance
skills.description: When dolls take damage greater than 30% of their Max HP, reduce that damage to 1 at a 1% chance, which can be increased with Dodge Rate, max 60%. Each doll can activate this effect a max of 4 times per battle.

skills.name: Rapid Charge - Reversal
skills.description: Reduces enemy skill charge by 60%, and allows their next ability to be dodged using character's own Dodge Rate. Does not apply to duration-based skills.

skills.name: Prayerful Summons - Abundance
skills.description: Summons gain 8% Attack, Hashrate, and HP.

skills.name: Prayerful Summons - Martyrdom
skills.description: For every 1 dead summon on the field, the Doll with the greatest Attack/Hashrate gains 3% Crit Rate and 6% Crit Damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack, but activating it again does not refresh the duration.

skills.name: Prayerful Summons - Finality
skills.description: After 4 allied summons are created, deal Operand Damage equal to 300% of highest allied Hashrate.

skills.name: Cyclonic Gust - Phantasm
skills.description: The selected target is interrupted and sent airborne for 3 seconds. They cannot be targeted during this period. If this target is an enemy unit, they are stunned for 2 seconds after landing. Summoons 2 Spirits next to the target to assist in battle. Their Max HP is equal to 30% of the HP of the Doll with the greatest Hashrate, and inherits 15% of that unit's Attack and Hashrate.

skills.name: Divine Inferno - Sentence
skills.description: Enemies affected by Pyrolysis take 10% more damage.

skills.name: Divine Inferno - Penitence
skills.description: When an ally applies Pyrolysis, apply 1 additional stack at a 15% chance.

skills.name: Divine Inferno - Retribution
skills.description: Enemies affected by Pyrolysis self-detonate after dying, dealing Operand damage equal to 150% of highest ally Hashrate to units in a 1 tile radius.

skills.name: Coordinated Fire - Spiral
skills.description: Deal Operand Damage equal to 240% of highest allied Hashrate to enemies within range, stunning them for 1 second and applies 5 stack of Pyrolysis.

skills.name: Zealot's Faith - Confirmation
skills.description: Dolls gain 10% Attack and Hashrate for 3 swconds after using an Ultimate.

skills.name: Zealot's Faith - Spirit
skills.description: After using an Ultimate, immediately regain 5% Ultimate Energy.

skills.name: Zealot's Faith - Fervor
skills.description: After using an Ultimate, the cooldown of all Ultimates are reduced by 2 seconds.

skills.name: Orbital Strike - Judgment
skills.description: Deal damage equal to 150% to the target with the lowest HP. that target then takes 30% increased damge from Ultimates for 3.5 seconds.
